'''Time To Say GoodBye'''是动画《[[RWBY]]》第Vol.2的OP。

== 简介 ==
《RWBY》 Vol.2 OP

== 歌曲 ==
<flashmp3>Time to Say Goodbye.mp3</flashmp3>

== 歌词 ==
{{LyricsKai|lstyle=color:|rstyle=color:;|reserveWidth=300px
|original=
theres a point where it tips 

theres a point where it breaks

theres a point where it bends 

and a point we just can’t take

anymore


theres a line that we’ll cross 

and there’s no return

theres a time and a place 

no bridges left to burn
anymore


we can’t just wait with lives at stake

until they think we’re ready

our enemies are gathering 

the storm is growing deadly


now its time to say goodbye

to the things we loved

and the innocence of youth

how the time seemed to fly

from our carefree lives

and the solitude and peace we always knew


theres a day when we’ll fight 

and we’re not gonna fall 

theres a day when we’ll stand 

and a day when we won’t crawl 

anymore 


there’s a moment in time 

and there’s no going back

when we’re pushed too hard 

and we won’t hold our attack

anymore


we can’t just cling to childish things

as evil just grows closer

humanity’s in jeopardy 

this fight is far from over


now its time to say goodbye

to the things we loved

and the innocence of youth

with a doubt in our minds

why we chose this life

and at times we can’t help wondering…


were we born to fight and die? 

sacrificed for one huge lie?

are we heroes keeping peace?

or are we weapons? 

pointed at the enemy 

so someone else can claim a victory?


now its time to say goodbye

to the things we loved

and the innocence of youth

how the time seemed to fly

from our carefree lives

and the solitude and peace we always knew
|translated=
是使其颠覆的那一刻

是使其破碎的那一刻

是使其动摇的那一刻

也是我们再也无法留下的

那一刻


我们即将越界

再不能回来

此时此地

再也没有后路可退



我们不能在危亡之中等待

等到他人认为时机成熟

敌人正在聚集

风暴已在酝酿


现在是告别的时候了

向着我们的所爱之物

向着年少的稚气告别

时光怎样地飞逝啊

从我们无忧无虑的生活中

从我们熟悉的孤独与安宁中一去不回


抗争之日将至

我们不会沉沦

此日我们将傲然矗立

此日我们将永不屈服




这仅为昙花一现

再不会回来

当我们被强逼时

我们将揭竿而起*




我们不能还贪恋儿时玩物

此时恶魔正步步紧逼

人类正在水深火热中

战争还远不会结束


现在是告别的时候了

向着我们的所爱之物

向着年轻的稚气告别

携着心中疑虑

自问我们为何选择如此生活

即时我们便不得不思考


我们是否生为战争，死为此？

为弥天大谎抛头颅，洒热血？

我们是英雄，维护和平？

我们还是兵戎，为人所用？

我们是兵戎，指向那敌寇

来让后人赞颂功绩？


现在是告别的时候了

向着我们的所爱之物

向着年轻的稚气告别

时光怎样地飞逝啊

从我们往昔无忧无虑的生活中

从我们熟悉的孤独与和平中逝去，一去不回
